PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-03332017-04-12ISED,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Small Business and Tourism of JOHN STANLEY (STAN) COOK JR. of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of fouryears, effective February 1, 2018, in the place of Michael M. Hannan, whose term will expire.
AttachmentsAttachment
